abstract: Over the past decade, a handful of specialty shops have popped up to help satisfy the city's voracious sweet tooth, with a focus on American-made goodies.
snippet: Over the past decade, a handful of specialty shops have popped up to help satisfy the city's voracious sweet tooth, with a focus on American-made goodies.
lead_paragraph: Cool Ranch Doritos, Mountain Dew, Milk Duds, chocolate cupcakes with sprinkles. None of these are easy finds in Prague. Over the past decade, however, a handful of specialty shops have popped up to help satisfy the city's voracious sweet tooth, with a focus on American-made goodies.

headline.main: Sating an American Sweet Tooth in Prague
